location.address: 501 E Kennedy Blvd Suite Floor 2, Tampa, FL 33602

description: Join us for the re:Cap event series. Get a comprehensive summary of key re:Invent 2025 announcements and insights from the keynotes, followed by three deep dive sessions selected from the most popular re:Invent presentations covering Amazon Bedrock, AgentCore, Kiro, and Amazon Quick Suite.
abstract: This event provides a recap of AWS re:Invent 2025, highlighting key announcements and offering deeper insights into selected AWS services and innovations including Bedrock, AgentCore, Kiro, and Quick Suite.

speakers.name: Trevor Roberts Jr
speakers.bio: Co-organizer and host of the Tampa Bay AWS User Group event. A detailed speaker bio is not provided on the Meetup event page.

speakers.name: Sam Kasimalla
speakers.bio: Co-organizer and host of the Tampa Bay AWS User Group event. A detailed speaker bio is not provided on the Meetup event page.

speakers.name: Daniel Killyevo
speakers.bio: Co-organizer and host of the Tampa Bay AWS User Group event. A detailed speaker bio is not provided on the Meetup event page.

additional_info.parking: Paid street parking, 717 lots, or City garages/lots. There is a game that evening at 7:30 PM, so plan accordingly. Street parking or the City's Twigg garage (about a 10 minute walk) are suggested for more economical options.
additional_info.instructions: Use the Kennedy entrance; an organizer will be waiting downstairs to direct you to the 2nd floor.
